template.name: INSERT_SIMPLE
template.description: Used to insert statement.
template.template-body: // Creating new insert statement <fc:import>java.sql.PreparedStatement</fc:import> #set ($vsnpt = "") #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #if ($vsnpt == "") #set ($vsnpt = "${field.name}") #else #set ($vsnpt = "${vsnpt}, ${field.name}") #end #end #set ($snpt = "") #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #if ($snpt == "") #set ($snpt = "?") #else #set ($snpt = "${snpt}, ?") #end #end String sql = "insert into ${schema}.${table} (${vsnpt}) values (${snpt})"; PreparedStatement ps = con.prepareStatement(sql); //set the insert fields #foreach ($field in ${fields}) <fc:import>${field.javaTypeName}</fc:import> ##${MethodFieldMap} holds one map and map has field type attribute ${field.type.toLowerCase().trim()} holds set method name of this field ps.${MethodFieldMap.get(${field.type.toLowerCase()})}($foreach.count, ${field.value}); #end int insertCount=ps.executeUpdate();

template.name: INSERT_WITH_NAMED_PARAMETER
template.description: Used to insert statement with named parameter.
template.template-body: // Creating new insert statement <fc:import>javax.sql.DataSource</fc:import> <fc:import>org.springframework.jdbc.core.namedparam.NamedParameterJdbcTemplate</fc:import> <fc:import>java.util.HashMap</fc:import> <fc:import>java.util.Map</fc:import> #set ($vsnpt = "") #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #if ($vsnpt == "") #set ($vsnpt = "${field.name}") #else #set ($vsnpt = "${vsnpt}, ${field.name}") #end #end #set ($snpt = "") #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #if ($snpt == "") #set ($snpt = ":${field.name}") #else #set ($snpt = "${snpt}, :${field.name}") #end #end String sqlQuery = "insert into ${schema}.${table} (${vsnpt}) values (${snpt})"; Map namedParameters = new HashMap(); #foreach ($field in ${fields}) <fc:import>${field.javaTypeName}</fc:import> namedParameters.put("${field.name}", ${field.value}); #end namedParameterJdbcTemplate.update(sqlQuery, namedParameters);

template.name: UPDATE_SIMPLE
template.description: Used to create update statement.
template.template-body: // Creating new update statement <fc:import>java.sql.PreparedStatement</fc:import> #set ($update_part = "") #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #set ($update_part = "${update_part} ${field.name} = ?") #if ($foreach.count < ${fields.size()}) #set ($update_part = "${update_part}, ") #end #end ##${where_part} holds the list of where conditions for the fields #set ($where_part = "") #if (${where_fields} && ${where_fields.size()} > 0) #set ($where_part = "where ") #end #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) #if (${field.whereQualifier.count} == 0) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${instance}.${field.name} ${field.whereQualifier.sign} ") #elseif (${field.whereQualifier.count} == 2) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${instance}.${field.name} ${field.whereQualifier.sign} ( ? AND ? )") #elseif (${field.whereQualifier.count} == 1 ) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${instance}.${field.name} ${field.whereQualifier.sign} ? ") #end #if ($foreach.count < ${where_fields.size()}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${where_separator} ") #end #end String sql = "update ${schema}.${table} ${instance} set ${update_part} ${where_part}"; PreparedStatement ps = con.prepareStatement(sql); #set ($velCount = 0) // Set the update fields #foreach ($field in ${fields}) ##${field.javaTypeName}is a computed attribute which holds the datatype for a field like String, int, etc. <fc:import>${field.javaTypeName}</fc:import> ps.${MethodFieldMap.get(${field.type.toLowerCase()})}($foreach.count, ${field.value}); #set ($velCount = $foreach.count + 1) #end // Set the where fields #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) <fc:import>${field.javaTypeName}</fc:import> #if (${field.whereQualifier.count} > 0) #if (${field.whereQualifier.count} == 2) ##{MethodwhereFieldMap} is the placeholder which holds one map and map has where field type attribute ${field.type.toLowerCase().trim()} which holds set method name of this field ps.${MethodWhereFieldMap.get(${field.type.toLowerCase()})}(${velCount}, ${field.value}); #set ($velCount = ${velCount} + 1) #end ps.${MethodWhereFieldMap.get(${field.type.toLowerCase()})}(${velCount}, ${field.value}); #set ($velCount = ${velCount} + 1) #end #end int updateCount = ps.executeUpdate();

template.name: SELECT_SIMPLE
template.description: Used to create select statement.
template.template-body: //create select statement <fc:import>java.sql.PreparedStatement</fc:import> <fc:import>java.sql.ResultSet</fc:import> #set ($Qt = '"') #set ($select_part = "") #if (!${fields} || ${fields.size()} == 0) #set ($select_part = "${instance}") #end #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #if (${field.getSQLFunction()} ) #if (${field.getSQLFunction().getCount()} == 0) #set ($select_part = "${select_part} ${field.getSQLFunction().name.toUpperCase()}()") #elseif (${field.getSQLFunction().getCount()} == 3) #set ($select_part = "${select_part} ${field.getSQLFunction().name.toUpperCase()}(${instance}.${field.name}, , )") #elseif (${field.getSQLFunction().getCount()} == 2) #set ($select_part = "${select_part} ${field.getSQLFunction().name.toUpperCase()}(${instance}.${field.name}, )") #elseif (${field.getSQLFunction().getCount()} == 4) #set ($select_part = "${select_part} ${field.getSQLFunction().getName().toUpperCase()} (${instance}.${field.name}, , , )") #else #set ($select_part = "${select_part} ${field.getSQLFunction().name.toUpperCase()}(${instance}.${field.name})") #end #else #set ($select_part = "${select_part}${instance}.${field.name}") #end #if (${use-alias-name}) #set ($select_part = "${select_part} ${field.getFastCodeDataBaseField().getAlaisName()}") #end #if ($foreach.count < ${fields.size()}) #set ($select_part = "${select_part}, ") #end #end #set ($join_part = "") #foreach ($field in ${join_fields}) #set ($join_part = "${join_part} join ${instance}.${field.name}") #end #set ($where_part = "") #if (${where_fields} && ${where_fields.size()} > 0) #set ($where_part = "where ") #end #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) #if( ${field.whereQualifier.count} == 0) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${instance}.${field.name} ${field.whereQualifier.sign} ") #elseif (${field.whereQualifier.count} == 2) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${instance}.${field.name} ${field.whereQualifier.sign} ( ? AND ? )") #elseif (${field.whereQualifier.count} == 1 ) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${instance}.${field.name} ${field.whereQualifier.sign} ? ") #end #if ($foreach.count < ${where_fields.size()}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${where_separator} ") #end #end #set ($group_part = "") #if (${group_by_fields}) #set ($group_part = "GROUP BY") #set ($size = ${group_by_fields.size()}) #set ($i = 1) #foreach ($field in ${group_by_fields}) #set ($group_part = "${group_part} ${field.name}") #set ($size = ${size} - ${i}) #if (${size} > 0) #set ($group_part = "${group_part},") #end #end #end #set ($order_part = "") #if (${order_by_fields}) #set ($order_part = "ORDER BY") #set ($size = ${order_by_fields.size()}) #set ($i = 1) #foreach ($field in ${order_by_fields}) #set ($order_part = "${order_part} ${field.name}") #set ($size = ${size} - ${i}) #if (${size} > 0) #set ($order_part = "${order_part},") #end #end #end final String sqlQuery = "select ${select_part} from ${schema}.${table} ${instance} ${where_part} ${group_part} ${order_part}";
